name: Custom Packaging Display
description: Displays the selected custom packaging option in checkout.

title.label: Title
title.description: Enter a title for the packaging display (optional).

text_size.label: Text Size
text_size.description: Choose the size for the text (e.g., small, base, medium, large).

option1_name.label: Option 1 Name
option1_name.description: Enter the name for packaging option 1 (must match cart attribute value).

option1_image.label: Option 1 Image URL
option1_image.description: Enter the image URL for packaging option 1.

option2_name.label: Option 2 Name
option2_name.description: Enter the name for packaging option 2 (must match cart attribute value).

option2_image.label: Option 2 Image URL
option2_image.description: Enter the image URL for packaging option 2.

option3_name.label: Option 3 Name
option3_name.description: Enter the name for packaging option 3 (must match cart attribute value).

option3_image.label: Option 3 Image URL
option3_image.description: Enter the image URL for packaging option 3.

packaging_section_title.label: Packaging Section Title
packaging_section_title.description: Title for the packaging section (default: 'Selected Packaging')

samples_section_title.label: Samples Section Title
samples_section_title.description: Title for the sample products section (default: 'Sample Products')

section_title_size.label: Section Title Text Size
section_title_size.description: Text size for section titles (e.g., small, base, medium, large). Defaults to 'medium'.

packaging_name_size.label: Packaging Name Text Size
packaging_name_size.description: Text size for the selected packaging name (e.g., small, base, medium, large). Defaults to 'medium'.

product_title_size.label: Product Title Text Size
product_title_size.description: Text size for sample product titles (e.g., extraSmall, small, base). Defaults to 'extraSmall'.

info_text_size.label: Informational Text Size
info_text_size.description: Text size for informational messages (e.g., loading, errors). Defaults to 'base'.

gift_message_section_title.label: Gift Message Section Title
gift_message_section_title.description: Title for the gift message section (default: 'Gift Message')
